title: Master SQL & UNIX with UNIQ Technologies
subtitle: Become a job-ready SQL & UNIX professional with UNIQ Technologies. Learn database fundamentals, SQL queries, joins, stored procedures, shell scripting, UNIX commands, and real-time system operations. Ideal for freshers, testers, support engineers, and anyone entering IT roles.

afterCompleted.title: Job Opportunities after SQL & UNIX Course
afterCompleted.description: SQL and UNIX skills are mandatory for IT roles across development, testing, support, and data teams. After completing our training, you can apply for roles such as:

whychoose.title: Industry-Oriented SQL Training
whychoose.description: Learn SQL queries, joins, indexes, stored procedures, and performance tuning exactly as used in real projects.

whychoose.title: Hands-On UNIX & Shell Scripting
whychoose.description: Master essential UNIX commands, file permissions, process management, and scripting for automation.

whychoose.title: Placement Support for IT Support Roles
whychoose.description: Daily job openings, mock interviews, and resume preparation until you get placed.

whychoose.title: Real-Time Scenario Coverage
whychoose.description: Includes log monitoring, server commands, cron jobs, SQL troubleshooting, and daily tasks of support engineers.

whychoose.title: Expert Trainers from Leading MNCs
whychoose.description: Learn directly from SQL DBAs and UNIX System Administrators with 8+ years of experience.

whychoose.title: Beginner-Friendly Training
whychoose.description: No prior coding or OS knowledge required. Perfect for IT freshers and career switchers.

whychoose.title: Flexible Timing Options
whychoose.description: Choose from weekday or weekend batches based on your schedule.

whychoose.title: Recognized Internship Certificate
whychoose.description: Receive a certificate recognized by MNCs and top IT recruiters.

faq.question: What is covered in the SQL & UNIX Course?
faq.answer: The course covers SQL basics to advanced topics (queries, joins, indexes, stored procedures) along with UNIX commands, shell scripting, file handling, cron jobs, and real-time support tasks.

faq.question: Is it required to have programming knowledge?
faq.answer: No. SQL & UNIX can be learned without prior programming experience. The course is beginner-friendly.

faq.question: Do you provide real-time practicals?
faq.answer: Yes. You will practice SQL queries in real DB environments and execute UNIX commands on a live Linux terminal.

faq.question: What job roles can I apply for after this course?
faq.answer: You can apply for SQL Developer, Support Engineer, Production Support, Linux/UNIX Associate, and Application Support roles.

faq.question: Do you cover shell scripting?
faq.answer: Yes. Shell scripting, automation basics, variables, loops, and real-time scripts are included.

faq.question: Will I get placement support?
faq.answer: Yes. You get 100% placement support until you get placed, with resume prep and mock interviews.

faq.question: Can I shift from online to offline?
faq.answer: Yes. You can switch learning mode anytime with no extra charges.

faq.question: Will I receive certification?
faq.answer: Yes. Youâ€™ll get a Course Completion & Internship Certificate recognized by IT recruiters.
